post_info.post_title: Tapes of sex abuse cover up at Planned Parenthood?

I'm confused. Did they use one of those "problem solvers" type person to make the call? It really doesn't matter what the answer is, since I think that Planned Parenthood is more along the lines of Assisted Abortion.
They do provide many more services than providing abortions :P

They do provide many more services than providing abortions :P

 Yet according to PP themselves, they provide FAR more abortions and EC services than any of their other services. :P
 
 PPFA Services (2002-2003)
 Surgical abortions: 227,385 
 Emergency contraception: 633,756 
 Prenatal care: 15,860 
 Adoption referrals: 1,963 
 (Source: www.plannedparenthood.org)

Yet according to PP themselves, they provide FAR more abortions and EC services than any of their other services. :P
 
 PPFA Services (2002-2003)
 Surgical abortions: 227,385 
 Emergency contraception: 633,756 
 Prenatal care: 15,860 
 Adoption referrals: 1,963 
 (Source: www.plannedparenthood.org)

 
 You left out a couple of things, though, which makes your post less reliable. But so nobody gets confused or deceived, here is more accurate statistics:
 
 http://www.plannedparenthood.org/library/BIRTHCONTROL/2002Services.html

 -
 In 2002, more than 1,500 affiliate staff and volunteer educators provided nearly 101,000 educational programs to more than 1.4 million people of all ages and in a variety of settings 
 -

PPFA also produced and distributed more than two million consumer health pamphlets. The Katharine Dexter McCormick Library responded to more than 3,000 research and information requests from researchers, sexual health professionals, and the general public

 So your claim about their abortions being more in number than their other services, well that just turned out to not be true.
